readable.title: 3477778668_81ff0a68e0
readable.content: A group of people dressed in formal wear pose for a picture . A wedding photo , the bridesmaids in purple , all of the groomsmen jumping . Bridal party posing in a park area . The bridesmaids in purple surround the bride and groom with the groomsmen in the rear . This wedding photo shows the wedding party , in purple and white , gathered outside .
